name: Johnsonville Cheesy Pepper Poppers
author: From the Kitchen at Johnsonville Sausage
summary: Combine your love of brats with delicious jalapeno poppers for some truly awesome appetizers! This recipe from Johnsonville takes the signature flavors of your favorite brat and adds some creamy, spicy goodness to the mix with the addition of jalapenos, cream cheese and Parmesan cheese. Whether these poppers are baked or grilled, they're perfect for turning up the heat at your next gathering!
ingredients: 1 (19 ounce) package Johnsonville® Original Bratwurst, removed from casing*
20 large jalapeno peppers, cut in half lengthwise, seeds removed**
directions: In a large skillet, brown and stir sausage until the meat is crumbled and no longer pink; drain
In a small bowl, combine cooked sausage, cream cheese and Parmesan cheese
Arrange filled peppers on an ungreased baking pan
Bake in a preheated 400 degrees F oven for 12 to 15 minutes or until lightly browned
